location_name: Fundão tailings dam, Germano iron ore mine near Mariana, Minas Gerais, Brazil
evidence: ['On 5 November 2015, the Fundão tailings dam suffered a catastrophic failure, resulting in flooding that devastated the downstream villages of Bento Rodrigues and Paracatu de Baixo.', 'The failure released 43.7 million cubic metres of mine tailings into the Doce River, causing a toxic brown mudflow to pollute the river and beaches near the mouth when it reached the Atlantic Ocean 17 days later.']
